geography.terrain: Forest with blade-like leaves and needle-sharp grass
notableFeatures: Red trees with razor-sharp leaves called Kenju
Environment stained red with prisoners' blood
Crimson coloration from blood of tortured prisoners

keyEvents.title: Luffy Enters Level 1
keyEvents.description: Luffy successfully infiltrates Impel Down and arrives on Level 1, beginning his mission to rescue Ace.
keyEvents.significance: First step in Luffy's dangerous journey through Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Jean Goen's Debut
keyEvents.description: Luffy encounters Jean Goen and other prisoners who inform him that Ace is on Level 5.
keyEvents.significance: Provides Luffy with crucial information about Ace's location.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Buggy Reunion
keyEvents.description: Luffy reunites with Buggy, who is attempting to escape from Level 1.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the unlikely alliance between former enemies.

keyEvents.title: Blugori Attack
keyEvents.description: Blugori guards attack Luffy and Buggy, forcing them to fight together.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the danger of Level 1 and forces cooperation between Luffy and Buggy.

culturalSignificance.description: Level 1 is the first floor of Impel Down where the least dangerous criminals are imprisoned. The torture method involves forcing prisoners to run through a forest of razor-sharp leaves and needle-like grass while being pursued by guards and Blugori.

statusHistory.description: Level 1 operating as the first level of Impel Down prison

reveals.information: First level of Impel Down, houses prisoners with bounties less than 15 million berries
Prisoners are forced to run through forests with blade-like leaves and needle-sharp grass, staining everything crimson with their blood
Guarded by Blugori (Blue Gorillas) under Saldeath's command
Buggy's Bara Bara no Mi powers make him immune to the cutting torture of the sharp leaves
